name: Monkey See Monkey Do (DiamondGamer61)
description:
Find the secret Bananas. Find Friends. Get more Bananas. Every Monkey's Dream.

(This has unintentionally become a rage platformer)

[This is a Demo Build. Not a full Build for Brackey's Jam 2021.1, I have plans to make this into a full game if i get support. Thanks for checking it out!

Please leave suggestions down below in the comment thread 😃 as that would help me out very much.
